meanings.sent1: The mollymawks soared gracefully over the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of mollymawks gliding through the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mollymawks had a funny waddle as they landed on the rocky shore.
meanings.sent4: The mollymawks' wingspan was as wide as a small boat.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the mollymawks in flight was truly majestic.

meanings.sent1: We saw many mollymawks nesting on the cliffs.
meanings.sent2: The sailors were amazed by the beauty of the mollymawks in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The noisy chatter of the mollymawks filled the air with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The mollymawks gathered in a swirling mass above the fishing boats.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the mollymawks' feathers were a sight to behold.
